Detailed Description

PatternSpotter using the optimally normalized Euclidean distance.

Member Function Documentation

void EuclideanSpotter::updateMatrix ( const tick_t  t,
const data_t *  sample,
data_t  cutoff 
) [virtual]

Top-level function to be called at each time step that updates the current distance (and any other state) when a new sample is received.

Parameters:
tThe current time
sampleA pointer to the latest data point in this signal
cutoffThe distance above which distance calculations should be abandoned

Implements PrefixSpotter.

References PrefixSpotter::denormalize(), PatternSpotter::dMin, PatternSpotter::M, PatternSpotter::mTime, PrefixSpotter::normalize(), and PatternSpotter::te.
